page.title: 17Supernatural-Gleadless
page.content: About 20-25 years ago a man living on Ironside Rd. experienced a woman grabbing hold of his wrists.He hit her and she disappeared.A women experienced her dead husband at the side of her. Some policemen on the beat at night once saw a carraige and horses two feet off the ground. Then there was a woman who, when she was ten,went upstairs and saw a shadow of someone dressed in a long black gown with a feather in her hat.Her sister was always dressing uo and trying to scare her so she started shouting "come down from the attic" but there was no answer.The girl became scared.Then she heard a bang downstairs. It was her sister coming in. The girl rushed downstairs to find that her sister had been out of the house all day-it must have been a ghost!
